alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 14 at 9:13PM CDT until April 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RENO AND CENTRAL KINGMAN COUNTIES... At 913 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Haven to near Pretty Prairie to 10 miles east of Nashville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingman, Haven, Pretty Prairie, Murdock, Waterloo, Zenda, Spivey, Cleveland, Cheney Lake, Mt Vernon, Kingman Airport, Rago and Cheney State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
